name: Super Dave´s underwater adventure
description:
Super Dave´s epic underwater adventure!

Dave was no longer wanted in his home and were flused away down the drains and the only way out of this nightmare is to swim far far away to freedom,
Watch out for pipies and other crazy stuff that might pop up along the way.

Compete with players from all over the world and see if your Davey will will collect the best highscores ever!

Simple one touch game suitable for all ages to play,
Crazy addictive once you get this started!
